# Truncation modes

**API Collection**

These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATextLayer/truncationMode] property.

## Constants

- **none**: Each line is displayed so that the text is either wrapped or clipped.
- **start**: Each line is displayed so that the end fits in the container and the missing text is indicated by some kind of ellipsis glyph.
- **end**: Each line is displayed so that the beginning fits in the container and the missing text is indicated by some kind of ellipsis glyph.
- **middle**: Each line is displayed so that the beginning and end fit in the container and the missing text is indicated by some kind of ellipsis glyph in the middle.

## Constants

- **Horizontal alignment modes**: These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATextLayer/alignmentMode] property.
